categories.name: Mini Splits
categories.description: These Mini Split Air Conditioner/Heat Pumps can cool, heat, dry or simply fan your room.

products.name: Classic America WiFi Ductless Wall Mount Mini Split Inverter Air Conditioner with Heat Pump, Full Set (12000 BTU 20 SEER 120VAC)
products.description:
SKU:MSC-12-HAC1
UPC:691165950561
The packaging includes Indoor Unit- Air Handler, Outdoor Unit with a GMCC Compressor, LCD Remote Control plus a FREE installation kit with 16 foot lineset, and installation is easy with a licensed and professional contractor.

products.name: 22000 BTU Classic America Mini Split A/C Heat Pump (SEER 15)
products.description:
SKU:TAC-22CHSA-JC12
UPC:856739008011
The packaging includes Indoor Unit- Air Handler, Outdoor Unit with a Hitachi Compressor, LCD Remote Control plus a FREE installation kit with 16 foot lineset, and installation is easy with a licensed and professional contractor.

products.name: Universal Outdoor Wall Mount Bracket for Ductless Mini Split Air Conditioners
products.description:
SKU:BRA-2002
UPC:617529985567
Used for supporting condensing units up to 350 pounds, this bracket features a crossbar that is attached to the wall, and two L-shaped support brackets that are hooked and bolted into place on the crossbar. The condensing unit is mounted onto the L-shaped brackets, and fastened using the bolts and anti-vibration feet provided.

categories.name: Remotes
categories.description:
Wireless Mini-Split Controls
    Wireless
    - Mini-split compatible replacement
    - Power ON/OFF
    - 3 speed fan with auto speed change
    - FAN, COOL, DRY, HEAT AUTO modes
    - Sleep function
    - Sweep and louver control
    - Clock with start and stop time
    - Timer On / Off
 
Wired Mini-Split Controls
    Wired
    - Mini-split compatible replacement
    - Power ON/OFF
    - 3 speed fan
    - COOL, FAN, HEAT modes
    - Sweep output
    - Compressor protection
    - Compressor status
    - Freeze protection (optional)

products.name: Wall Mount Remote Control Holder Multipurpose Storage Box
products.description:
SKU:RemoteControl-Holder
UPC:730957374052
Easy Solution for Missing Items: Remote holder dimensions are 2 1/2*1 3/8*5 1/2 inches.
QuickInstallation: This item includes a screw and anchor for wall mounting/securing heavier items, and a Velcro kit for smooth surfaces and easy application. Can also be used as a stand on any desk.
Durable: This remote holder is made of sturdy acrylic and has high transparency, making it easy to see contents inside.
Made With Care: The front and back of this holder are protected with a clear film to prevent scratches, peels off with ease.
Versatility: More uses than just a remote, this holder can also be used to organize pens, make up and more. Space saving and easily used in any office, home, hotels, etc.
